page.title: 17Pets at Cottesmore
page.content: My name is Nina Ball, I have lots of pets but I am only writing about 3 of them: 2 Guinea pigs and my Dog.My dog is called Diamond, she has three walks a day, one in the morning at about 6 o-clock and one at about 9 o-clock at night.She has a lead, a ball, a brush and comb, a box and 2 bowls; one for water and one for food. We feed her once a day, just before her evening walk. She gets no titbits apart from some chocolate drops when she has been good.She loves children and even if robbers were there she would lick them.When she sees another dog or cat she always chases them. My guinea pigs are called Sooty and Scruffy.They are fed morning and night.Their cages are in my Dads shed.We clean them out every week.They tip their bowls over, so they have dried food all over their cages.
